title: Handwriting font from Whiskas advert
content:
I have been searching high and low for this handwriting font:  
 [http://wtfcdn.myfonts.com/uploads/images/8b/8be25b1e4b02fdc9b570ddbf0a94...](http://web.archive.org/web/20111209213249/http:/wtfcdn.myfonts.com/uploads/images/8b/8be25b1e4b02fdc9b570ddbf0a94f318.66981.jpeg "http://wtfcdn.myfonts.com/uploads/images/8b/8be25b1e4b02fdc9b570ddbf0a94f318.66981.jpeg")

Nobody on WhatTheFont forum can help, and I have trawled through every handwriting font on MyFonts - over a thousand of them. I've seen it used in the Whiskas catfood advert, but in other places as well. Can anyone help?

thanks

Phil
author: phil38555615

comments.content: The image link no longer works, so we're going to call this thread done.

If it's any of the fonts shown on this current web ad, maybe we can re-open it?

- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111209213249im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wiskas_ad_5657.gif)

Ressurrecting this thread, since I was looking for a Whiskas handwriting font as well. The font he probably meant was Tekton Pro.  
 [![Photobucket](http://web.archive.org/web/20111209213249im_/http:/i947.photobucket.com/albums/ad312/maijavilkina/Whiskas_logoslogans_conv.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20111209213249/http:/s947.photobucket.com/albums/ad312/maijavilkina/?action=view&current=Whiskas_logoslogans_conv.jpg)
